column5: Pushed the wrong thing using the mobile version on my phone. Lost it. and I can't figure out how to get back in to the  mobile version. Anybody know what to do? Thanks
What model is the phone? I would call your provider of service or contact the manufacturesweb site.
Figured it out. Had to sign out and then back in. ?

I've had this problem before.... There is a button on the main page. It's the same colour as the background though so you can only see it after you click it!  I made a screenshot for if it ever happens to you again.
Main page. Didn't see it Thanks Dutch!
Never could find that button lol.Not sure why so hidden?
